name: Escape from Corrin (Mac Version)
description:
A short game made from Driftwood Gaming's 5th Game Jam. 

Set in an alternate universe inspired by the Dune series, Serena and her crew must save Vorian from the Automatons. Battle through space and get him to safety!

A special thanks to Moghunter (Atelier Rgss) and Yanfly for making this possible!
